translations: 使个性化；使适应个别需要；使表现出区别（individualise 的过去式及过去分词，individualise 等于 individualize）

sentences.sentence: Do the staffs give individualised attention to each guest?
sentences.translation: 工作人员能给每位客人个性化得关注吗？

sentences.sentence: We propose an individualised approach to patients taking this increasingly common drug.
sentences.translation: 我们建议对那些服用这种越来越普通的药物的病人的处理应该个体化。

sentences.sentence: It will not be enough merely to flog products and services, no matter how individualised they are.
sentences.translation: 仅仅出售商品和服务是不够的，不管这些商品有多个性化。
